mapper.select: SELECT SUM(op.product_price - op.coupon_discount - op.point_discount) - (SELECT SUM(op2.product_price - op2.coupon_discount - op2.point_discount) FROM canceled_products cp LEFT JOIN order_products op2 ON cp.order_product_id = op2.order_product_id WHERE cp.cancellation_status = '취소완료' AND op2.buy_confirm_date = #{date}) AS final_sales FROM order_products op WHERE op.buy_confirm_date = #{date};

SELECT SUM(op.product_price - op.coupon_discount - op.point_discount) FROM returns r LEFT JOIN order_products op ON r.order_product_id = op.order_product_id WHERE r.return_status = '환불완료' AND DATE(r.return_complete_date) = #{date}

SELECT SUM(op.product_price - op.coupon_discount - op.point_discount) - (SELECT SUM(op2.product_price - op2.coupon_discount - op2.point_discount) FROM canceled_products cp LEFT JOIN order_products op2 ON cp.order_product_id = op2.order_product_id WHERE cp.cancellation_status = '취소완료' AND DATE_FORMAT(op2.buy_confirm_date, '%Y-%m') = #{month}) AS final_sales FROM order_products op WHERE DATE_FORMAT(op.buy_confirm_date, '%Y-%m') = #{month};

SELECT SUM(op.product_price - op.coupon_discount - op.point_discount) FROM order_products op LEFT JOIN returns r ON op.order_product_id = r.order_product_id WHERE r.return_status = '환불완료' AND DATE_FORMAT(op.buy_confirm_date, '%Y-%m') = #{month}
